article_title: Brazil Halts Use Of Silimed Silicone Breast Implants, Follows Europe
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: brazil, halts, use, silimed, silicone, breast, implants, follows, europe

og.description: Brazil's health regulator suspended the production of Brazilian breast-implant maker Silimed as a "precautionary measure" after an inspection found the company failed production standards.
